txt.en: Quickbeam is at Derndingle in south-east Fangorn.
Quickbeam has asked you to quiet the forest west of Derndingle.
Tend the forest West of Derndingle
Roots have infested the area West of Derndingle
'When we marched on Isengard, the forest was awoken. It is very angry with the actions of the wizard we trusted. Too angry, I cannot calm it myself.\n\n'Please tend the forest west of Derndingle.'
The vines west of Derndingle are strangling the growing saplings
When the Ents decided to march to war, the forest awoke, angry and betrayed. With Isengard destroyed, Quickbeam is attempting to calm Fangorn and quiet it once more.
